backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing projects, user profiles, and access control with storage maps and create/query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing their roles in auth, servers, plugins, plans, and UI.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Frontend deployment checklist outlining prerequisites and clean rebuild steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and loading providers with an auth-gated root component.
frontend/src/AppProviders.tsx: Wrapper composing AuthProvider, PlanProvider, and ServerProvider in required order.
frontend/src/auth/AuthContext.tsx: Authentication context handling signup, login, logout, and session management via localStorage.
frontend/src/auth/authStorage.ts: Implements signup, login, logout, and session handling using localStorage with basic validation and password hashing.
frontend/src/auth/authTypes.ts: Defines AuthUser and AuthSession interfaces and storage key constants.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Provides a React error boundary that logs errors and displays a detailed UI with toggleable error info.
frontend/src/components/FileManager.tsx: Renders a navigable file explorer for a server's file tree with breadcrumb navigation and read-only checks.
frontend/src/components/PaidPluginPurcha: A dialog for buying paid plugins supporting QR payment, redeem codes, and direct payment with success handling.
frontend/src/components/ServerBrandingFo: Allows editing server branding including logo, title, and subtitle with Minecraft color code preview.
frontend/src/components/ServerCreateDial: Dialog for creating a new server with name and domain suffix selection.
frontend/src/files/fileSeed.ts: Provides a default Minecraft-like file tree structure with sample folders and files.
frontend/src/formatting/mcFormat.tsx: Parses text with Minecraft color codes and renders colorized React elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, and clearing identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module exporting nothing, reserved for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theme colors and layout styling.
frontend/src/layout/LeftNav.tsx: Renders the left navigation sidebar with dynamic server-specific links and a static plans link.
frontend/src/layout/PanelLayout.tsx: Defines the main panel layout combining LeftNav, TopHeader, and routed content.
frontend/src/layout/TopHeader.tsx: Displays current server info, user dropdown, and plan badge in a top navigation bar.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AccessSharingPage.tsx: Allows server owners to invite or revoke user access with permission levels and shows existing shared access.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Provides login and signup forms with validation, error handling, and UI tabs for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ConsolePage.tsx: Displays a server console with auto-scrolling logs and start/stop controls based on permissions.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows all servers with status and stats, allowing creation and selection for navigation.
frontend/src/pages/FilesPage.tsx: Provides a file manager interface for a specific server’s filesystem.
frontend/src/pages/PlansPage.tsx: Displays the current VPS plan and allows browsing and purchasing different plans.
frontend/src/pages/PlayersPage.tsx: Lists online players for a server with basic details, or shows status messages if empty/offline.
frontend/src/pages/PluginsPage.tsx: Enables browsing, installing, uninstalling, and purchasing free or paid plugins for a server.
frontend/src/pages/ServerDetailsPage.tsx: Shows high-level server info, usage stats, and quick navigation/actions like start, stop, and page links.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Displays server settings and a branding form if the user has permission to edit them.
frontend/src/plans/planCatalog.ts: Defines the VPSPlan interface and exports a catalog of available VPS plans with specs and pricing.
frontend/src/plans/PlanContext.tsx: Provides a React context for managing the user's current VPS plan and updating it based on authentication state.
frontend/src/plans/planStorage.ts: Handles saving and loading a user's selected plan from localStorage keyed by email.
frontend/src/plugins/paidPluginCatalog.t: Defines the PaidPlugin interface and a catalog of purchasable plugins with pricing and metadata.
frontend/src/plugins/pluginCatalog.ts: Defines the Plugin interface and exports a catalog of free server plugins with descriptions and download counts.
frontend/src/servers/ServerContext.tsx: Implements a React context for managing user servers, handling creation, selection, updates, and simulated runtime activity.
frontend/src/servers/serverStorage.ts: Provides functions to load, save, and delete servers from localStorage with user-based filtering.
frontend/src/servers/serverTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript types for Minecraft server objects, console logs, players, file nodes, and sharing permissions.
frontend/src/sim/runtimeSimulator.ts: Simulates Minecraft server console output and player activity, generating random events and chat lines. Manages player join/leave, chat, and periodic console messages.
frontend/src/utils/fakeQr.ts: Creates a fake QR code by drawing random modules and corner markers on a canvas and returning it as a data URL.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL params, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted parameters across navigation. Includes helpers for clearing parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, animations, and layout settings, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks overall project state, including feature implementations, requirements, and notes for domain selector and fake paid‑plugin purchase flow.
